listBibl.head: Sources for the Data in this Born Digital Prosopography

bibl.title: A literary history of medicine: the 'Uyūn al-anbā' fī ṭabaqāt al-aṭibbā' of Ibn Abī Uṣaybi'ah

editorialDecl.p:
The prosopographical data in this document was encoded from
Emilie Savage-Smith, Simon Swain, and G. J. H. van Gelder, eds., A Literary History of Medicine: The “Uyūn al-Anbā” Fī Ṭabaqāt al-Aṭibbā’ of Ibn Abī Uṣaybi’ah, 5 vols. (Leiden: Brill, 2020).

category.catDesc: Used to denote a date calculated by the editor from a regnal year given in the text.
